ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: In the same way that I summarized the course in answer to question #1. I would highly recommend the course, especially for those who are not familiar with the Spanish language.

I would recommend it. Basically, Spanish 504 teaches you to catch the gist of a Spanish text on first reading and render a reasonably accurate translation with the help of a dictionary. It's a valuable skill for anyone who uses Spanish as a secondary research language. Students looking for greater mastery should probably look elsewhere.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: As a result of the course and the two translation projects I did, I considered additional texts in Spanish that I may have overlooked in the past.
I gained a better reading knowledge of Spanish, which may prove important for my work.
